name: The Reaper's Road
description:
Reap the souls of those who's time has come. You are the "Grim Reaper" tasked with leading the souls of those who are to die. But be careful to not be late, or you will have to pay the price yourself. It's a difficult job, but an important one.

In this game you will need to reap the souls of 7 people, each within a certain time limit. If you fail, well you fail. You'll be given a image of each target and there soul color (soul color is equal to eye color). It's also important to note, there are 3 towns, each human will have there own set town, so if your target's town is 2 then don't worry about looking in the other towns. You can also reap multiple humans at the same time, so be careful that you don't have more than the one target highlighted.

This game was made for the 72nd mini game jam, so don't expect too much.

Use W,A,S,D to Move and use K to Reap a soul.
Use LEFT SHIFT to Sprint.
